metadata.name: Contemporary Goddesses
metadata.description: This series is showing artist’s hybridized world among the mythological history of goddesses, so you can see her body at equivocal landscape even sacred places through her traveling abroad ,far from any archetypal sign and veil or any ancient religious icon in her appearance to show that where she come from; Artist have used photo montage technique by stitching goddesses portraits in to her figures from the women of real life in William Adolphe Bouguereau and John William God ward paintings around 19 century to create her desired world, because of believing that the goddesses’ archetype are symbols of independence ,beauty and power and the body in a landscape that has been associated with ideas of freedom, personal, duality, sexual or political ,the matters that artist is searching for..
